= Pacman =

* Print installed packages
  - pacman -Q
  - pacman -Q | grep <specific package>

* Install package in pacman database
  - sudo packman -S <package name>

* Search for package in database
  - pacman -Ss <package name>

* Install packages from AUR
  - https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/pacman#Installing_packages
